scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.ios.device: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.demo.android2: npm run build && npm run reset
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns platform remove android && tns plugin remove nativescript-webrtc && tns plugin add C:\Users\Greg\Documents\GitHub\nativescript-webrtc && tns install
scripts.setup: npm i && cd demo && npm i && cd nativescript-webrtc && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add nativescript-webrtc && cd nativescript-webrtc
scripts.reset: cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-webrtc && tns plugin add C:\Users\Greg\Documents\GitHub\nativescript-webrtc && tns run android
